sentence.Network_en: "I've already done that," said Ronnie virtuously.
sentence.Network_cn: “我已经把它做完了，”罗尼得意地说道。

sentence.Network_en: Pro 31:29 Many daughters have done virtuously, but thou excellest them all.
sentence.Network_cn: 箴31:29说, 才德的女子很多,惟独你超过一切.

list.abs: virtuously 合乎道德地virtuousness 贞德virulence 有毒
2010年9月7日 -  梅花代表了virtuousness(高洁), firmsness(坚贞不渝) 康乃馨 carnation 康乃馨代表了love,, motherly love(母爱), beauty ,purity, sincerity( 真情.

entry.tran: 有德行的;道德高尚的;正直的
entry.def: A virtuous person behaves in a moral and correct way.

example.ex: Louis was shown as an intelligent, courageous and virtuous family man.
example.tran: 路易斯在人们眼里是一个智慧、勇敢、品德高尚的顾家男人。

entry.tran: 自命不凡的;自鸣得意的
entry.def: If you describe someone as virtuous, you mean that they have done what they ought to do and feel very pleased with themselves, perhaps too pleased.

example.ex: I cleaned the flat, which left me feeling virtuous.
example.tran: 我打扫了整个公寓，这让我觉得自己很了不起。

means.word_mean: 2. in a chaste and virtuous manner;

auth_sentence.content: They drew huge numbers of people from all walks of life who wanted to learn to live their lives better, and more virtuously.
auth_sentence.res_content: They drew huge numbers of people from all walks of life who wanted to learn to live their lives better, and more virtuously.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They drew huge numbers of people from all walks of life who wanted to learn to live their lives better, and more virtuously.

auth_sentence.content: The doctor, late forties yet fresh-faced looking, virtuously sips green tea throughout the day.
auth_sentence.res_content: The doctor, late forties yet fresh-faced looking, virtuously sips green tea throughout the day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The doctor, late forties yet fresh-faced looking, virtuously sips green tea throughout the day.
